OuterwearPageShop.productDescription: A stylish crocodile dons a vibrant, oversized hoodie with bold stripes of color. Perfect for adding some personality to your casual look, this hoodie embodies playful streetwear vibes with its comfortable and relaxed fit.

A fashionable rat rocks a loose-fitting plaid shirt, giving off a relaxed, laid-back aesthetic. Paired with baggy jeans and sneakers, this look is ideal for those who embrace effortlessly cool, urban fashion.

This rat sports a cozy, checkered cotton coat, blending functionality and style. The outfit is accessorized with a branded cap and casual sneakers, perfect for cool weather outings with a streetwear edge.

A trendsetting crocodile shows off a handmade cropped sweater with a bold logo. The design delivers a high-fashion, casual vibe, pairing well with sunglasses and a stylish cap for a cool, effortless look.

This crocodile flaunts a crewneck sweater adorned with a Korean flag design. Paired with brown loafers and a retro aesthetic, the ensemble merges cultural pride with a laid-back, fashionable silhouette.

This rat looks effortlessly cool in a plaid flannel shirt, layered over a casual tee and paired with relaxed denim jeans. With accessories like a cap and trendy sneakers, this outfit exudes an easygoing, grunge-inspired style.
